meanings.definition: A dessert made of mud-like mixture of chocolate and cream.
meanings.sent1: I love to eat a delicious mudpie after dinner.
meanings.sent2: The bakery down the street makes the best mudpie in town.
meanings.sent3: At the party, everyone was surprised when the mudpie turned out to be a real dessert!
meanings.sent4: Her baking skills were so good, she could turn a simple mudpie into a gourmet treat.
meanings.sent5: The mudpie looked so tempting with its creamy chocolate layers.

meanings.definition: A child's toy made by mixing mud and water and shaping it into a pie-like form.
meanings.sent1: The kids had fun making mudpies in the backyard.
meanings.sent2: Every summer, the children would create imaginative mudpies in the sandbox.
meanings.sent3: The mudpie contest at the fair had everyone laughing at the messy creations.
meanings.sent4: The little girl proudly presented her mudpie masterpiece to her parents.
meanings.sent5: The mudpie sculptures in the park were surprisingly detailed and artistic.
